column4: Hey whats best the mediacenter for linux these days? I'm not interested in TV at all as I live in China. But I have a catalog of some 700dvd's (the flip side of no tv in China) so i need it to have pretty good dvd cataloging
so you can minimize the mythtv bit and use it like a standard desktop?
of course you can kill the mythtv front end//media center
it's ubuntu in the backend, so you can have a full gnome-desktop installed also if you're into that jazz/etc, not sure how it comes default
